name: Seperated Shadows at Twilight
description:
Venture forth into the mystical forest, shrouded in darkness and magic's hold. In search of thy lost sister, embark on this eerie quest, so bold. Unveil the secrets that the woods doth keep, and bravely face the trials untold. With cunning and bravery, be reunited with thy sibling, as love and family take hold.

Break the riddles to find the answers.  Use answers to proceed further, and explore the dark world. and the narrative-driven storyline.

CONTROLS :
Arrow keys to move
S key to switch
E key to interact
